zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，谨慎观望]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币(AVAX)的价格在13.9839美元附近震荡整理。24小时变化幅度较小，表明市场情绪偏向于观望。短期内价格未能突破14.00美元的心理关口，显示出一定的阻力。若价格持续在该区间内波动，可能会形成一个震荡区间，交易者需保持谨慎。

从技术指标来看，MACD当前处于负值区域，显示出短期内卖压较大，但由于信号线数据缺失，无法全面判断后市趋势。RSI指标未公布，因此我们无法判断市场是否处于超买或超卖状态。但结合SMA(20)的支撑水平13.89465来看，价格若跌破该水平，可能会进一步回调。

支撑位方面，13.9617美元为近期低点，若有效跌破可能引发更大幅度的下行。而上方阻力位则在14.00美元附近，突破该水平有望引发短期反弹。投资者应关注这两个关键价位，以制定相应的交易策略。

建议短线交易者可在支撑位附近寻找买入机会，止损设置在13.90美元下方，而在接近阻力位时则考虑适当获利了结。长线投资者则可继续关注市场动向，耐心等待更明确的趋势信号。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $13.9839, reflecting a minor decline of 0.05% over the past 24 hours. This stability indicates a consolidation phase after recent volatility. The price has tested the $14.00 mark, demonstrating a resistance level that traders should monitor closely. If AVAX can break above this level, it may signal a bullish trend, potentially targeting $14.50 as the next resistance. Conversely, failure to hold above $13.96 could lead to a test of lower support levels.

The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) stands at $13.89465, suggesting that the current price is slightly above this key indicator, which typically acts as a support level. This positioning may provide a buffer against further declines, but traders should remain cautious. If the price dips below the SMA, it could trigger selling pressure, leading to potential support near $13.70. Monitoring these levels will be crucial in determining the next short-term movements in AVAX.

On the momentum front, the MACD value of -0.026327111 indicates bearish momentum, although the lack of a signal line complicates the interpretation. Without a proper signal, traders might find it challenging to derive actionable insights from this indicator. A crossover into positive territory could indicate a shift in momentum, suggesting potential buying opportunities. However, until such a crossover occurs, maintaining a cautious stance is advisable.

In conclusion, traders should remain vigilant as AVAX navigates its current price range. Keeping an eye on resistance at $14.00 and support around $13.70 will provide critical insights into potential price movements. Utilizing stop-loss orders just below the SMA could help manage risk while allowing for the possibility of upside if bullish momentum develops. As always, a diversified approach and risk management are essential in the volatile cryptocurrency market.
